snippet: The Italian Civil Protection Agency said on Tuesday that deteriorating safety conditions had forced divers to suspend the underwater search for missing people aboard the Costa Concordia.
abstract: Italian officials force rescue divers to suspend underwater search for missing people in the wrecked Costa Concordia cruise ship, citing deteriorating safety conditions.

byline.original: By GAIA PIANIGIANI and ALAN COWELL
byline.contributor: Gaia Pianigiani reported from Florence and Alan Cowell from London.

lead_paragraph: The Italian Civil Protection Agency said on Tuesday that deteriorating safety conditions had forced divers to suspend the underwater search for missing people aboard the Costa Concordia.

headline.seo: Divers Suspend Underwater Search of Costa Concordia in Italy
headline.main: Divers Suspend Underwater Search of Stricken Italian Liner
headline.print_headline: Italy: Search Suspended for Cruise Ship Survivors
